events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has identified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning refund and wrong item.
An available agent has been assigned to handle this refund request case for faster resolution.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 456123789, and I have attached the photo showing the wrong product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately, and you should see the amount credited within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prompt refund processing.
The refund request has been processed successfully. Please check your payment method in a few days.
Just following up to confirm you received the refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
I confirm the refund was credited to my account. Thanks again for your excellent service!
Closing this case now as the refund was received and issue resolved to the customer's satisfaction.
